result.eng: When he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.
result.ga: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar ais
result.orig: Ar imeacht dó dúirt Fionn go mbeadh sé ar ais

result.ponchtml: Ar imeaċt dó dúirt Fionn go mbeaḋ sé ar aisWhen he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.

result.eng: Anybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht

result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart go mbeaḋ Gaeilge ṁaiṫ ag an té a ċaiṫ an oiread sin ama sa ĠaeltaċtAnybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.

result.eng: He should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.

result.eng: If I had money, I'd buy a big house.

result.eng: We want healthy people to give blood.

result.eng: It hurt me that my mother should be begging.
result.ga: Ghoin sé mé go mbeadh mo mháthair ag lorg déirce

result.eng: I knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.
result.ga: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liom

result.ponchtml: Ṫuig mé féin dá ḃféadfainn an Eoraip a ḃaint amaċ go mbeaḋ liomI knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.

result.eng: He had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ga: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.orig: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad

result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé de ṁisneaċ aige t-léinte a ċaiṫeaṁ a ḃí ċoṁ teann sin go mbeaḋ eagla ort go bpollfaḋ a ḋidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.

result.eng: The soup should be ready for the lunchtime rush.

result.eng: She was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].

result.eng: She could have laughed and that would be it.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí

result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
